body_content.explanation: to make something part of something larger again after a period when it was not part of that thing:
examples: The province was later reincorporated into the empire.
After the Civil War the southern states were reincorporated into the Union.

body_content.explanation: of a business, to close down and start up again as a new organization; to close a business in this way:
examples: Some of the airlines will reincorporate in other countries.
The original firm was re-incorporated in 1903 as the Ford Motor Company.
